name: BOTanist.exe
description:
BOTanist.exe is a cosy farming sim where you play as a robot with the sole purpose of growing crops. There's no goals here, no distracting quests or impending plot lines, just you, a farm, and crops to grow.

Controls:

WASD: Movement

E: Inventory

Esc: Pause

Middle Mouse: Open Radial Menu

Left Click: Use Item

Guide:

Open the shop by approaching the market stall on the entrance to the farm.

Walk into the barn to sell your harvested crops.

Walk up to the house to shut down your BOT for the night and progress to the next day.

Credits:

UI Art from Comp-3 Interactive

Icons from LadyLuck

Background Music from Micah Fischer

Sound Effects from OmegaPixelArt

3D Assets from JustCreate
